rationale: The segment contains the technical term 'highly pathogenic avian influenza', which is excluded by the TECH_TERM_GUARD.
statement_text: A new case of highly pathogenic avian influenza has been detected at a poultry farm in Australia's southeastern Victoria state, officials said on Thursday, a day after the country reported its first human case of the virus and also a strain on an egg farm.
